channel.title: New Sever, need recuits!
channel.description:
Okay, today I had a thought, a thought that, I'm going to make a new private server! My last two servers I made sucked. And i was hoping for them to succeed, obviously, they didn't... Lol
I need a team to help me make a new private server, also I need a good starting place. Please post one at this link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,156095.0.html
So far, this is based at varrock fountain, which I don't want. At the moment I need.
Coders, Moderators, Forum Moderators, Co-Owner,
I currently have:
Coders:
Moderators:
Forum Moderators:
Co-Owner:
Okay here is the thingy to apply. :P
Name: In Game Name: Forum Name: What you're applying for: Experience: Java Experience:
That is all for now. Will add more later.

@x0_0wn wrote:

Yea thats try… They dont last long at all. Accept this one of course.

Still need more people -.-"

item.title: New Sever, need recuits!
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

mprules:

Why do people keep making forums… And teams…

Teams :
Cause The Person Is Probably Bored Or Doesn’t Know What Happens To Teams After A Few Days So They Just Make One For Fun =/
Forums :
To Keep Updates On His/Her Server.

Read full topic

Experience: I am very good with most forums
Java Experience: None, I don’t code

Extra: I can host you some good SMF forums but you would need a .co.nr domain Msg me on msn : Phr.ee.zex@hotmail.com if your interested
